traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi! I need to cancel my flights under reservation ID SI5UKW. Can you help me with that?
I can assist you with canceling your reservation. Could you please provide your user ID and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)?
My user ID is amelia_rossi_1297, and the reason is a change of plan. I hope there's a way to cancel it.

The policies are quite strict in this regard. If you need further assistance, I recommend contacting a human agent who might be able to explore other options for you. - Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi there! I'm looking to make some changes to an upcoming flight I have.
I can help you with that. Could you please provide your user ID and the reservation ID for the flight you want to modify?
Sure, my reservation ID is 1N99U6.
Could you please provide your user ID as well?
Yes, my user ID is james_taylor_7043.

Would you like to proceed with changing to one of these flights? If so, please confirm the flight number you'd like to switch to and provide a payment method for any price difference.
I'd like to switch to Flight Number HAT266 at 13:00 EST. Could you also assist me with removing the checked bag from my reservation and provide a refund for it?

I can assist with changing your flight to Flight Number HAT266. However, I can only add checked bags, not remove them. Would you like to proceed with the flight change? If so, please provide a payment method for the price difference of $146 for the new flight.
I thought the system would allow me to remove the checked bag. Can you check again, please? I'd like to resolve both issues at once.

Unfortunately, the system does not allow for the removal of checked bags once they have been added to a reservation. You can only add additional bags if needed. 

Would you like to proceed with changing your flight to Flight Number HAT266? If so, please provide a payment method for the price difference of $146 for the new flight.
Okay, let's proceed with changing the flight to HAT266. As for the payment, can I use the same method used on my original booking?

Yes, you can use the same payment method as your original booking. I will proceed with changing your flight to Flight Number HAT266, using the gift card for the payment of $146. 

Please confirm if you would like to proceed with these details.
Yes, please go ahead and make the changes with the same payment method. Thank you!

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.

I can help you with that. Could you please provide your user ID and reservation ID so I can access your booking details?
I'm sorry, but I don't remember my reservation ID at the moment. Can you help me with just my name? It's Ivan Rossi.
I'm unable to search for reservations using just a name. Could you please provide your user ID or any other information that might help locate your reservation?

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi! I need to make some changes to my upcoming flight.
I can help you with that. Could you please provide your user ID and the reservation ID for the flight you want to modify?
Sure, my reservation ID is HXDUBJ.
Could you please provide your user ID so I can access your reservation details?
I'm sorry, but I don't remember my user ID at the moment.
No problem! If you can provide your email address or any other information associated with your profile, I can look up your user ID for you.
My email address is yara_garcia_1905@gmail.com.

2. BOOK Task: The user requests to book a new flight, and the assistant asks for specific details (trip type, cabin class, passenger details) and provides options for flights. The user selects a flight, and the assistant completes the booking. This is also procedural as it involves a series of steps to complete the booking.

Additionally, there are declarative elements where the assistant provides information about eligibility for a full refund and details about flight options, which involve the assistant providing information based on the user's membership status and preferences. Therefore, the conversation is both procedural and declarative.

task.instruction: You are aarav_ahmed_6699. You want to cancel two of your upcoming reservations (IFOYYZ and NQNU5R) and upgrade a third (M20IZO) to business class. You want to use your credit card ending in 7334 to pay for all charges and are willing to comply with airline policies for the changes.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi! I need some help with my upcoming travel plans. Can you assist me with canceling a couple of reservations?

I can certainly help you with canceling your reservations. Could you please provide me with your user ID and the reservation IDs for the reservations you wish to cancel? Additionally, I'll need to know the reason for the cancellation for each reservation.
Sure, my user ID is aarav_ahmed_6699. I want to cancel the reservations with IDs IFOYYZ and NQNU5R. As for the reason, I've had a change in plans and won't be needing these flights anymore.

2. **Upgrading a Reservation (M20IZO)**: This task is also procedural as the user provides specific instructions to upgrade a reservation, and the assistant follows these instructions step-by-step, confirming the upgrade and processing the payment.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Bonjour! I would like to cancel all of my upcoming flights, please.

I can help you with that. Could you please provide your user ID, the reservation ID for the flights you want to cancel, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)?
Merci! My user ID is amelia_davis_8890. I'm afraid I don't have the reservation ID with me right now, but I would like to cancel for personal reasons.

Hello! I'd like to cancel some of my upcoming flights. Could you assist me with that?

I can help you with that. Could you please provide your user ID, the reservation ID for the flights you want to cancel, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)?

Certainly! My user ID is amelia_davis_8890. Unfortunately, I don't have the reservation IDs handy right now. I'm canceling because I want to free up seats for others who might need them. Can we proceed without the IDs?

To proceed with the cancellation, I will need the reservation IDs. You can check your email or account for the reservation details. Once you have the reservation IDs, please provide them, and I'll assist you with the cancellation process.
I understand. I'll try to find them. In the meantime, is there any way to start the cancellation process for flights that have only one passenger on the reservation?

Once you have the reservation IDs, I can assist you with the cancellation process for any flights, regardless of the number of passengers on the reservation. Please let me know if there's anything else I can help you with in the meantime.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi! I believe there might have been a mix-up with my flight bookings. Can you help me check if there are any multiple flights booked for the same day on my profile?
I can help with that. Could you please provide your user ID so I can check your flight bookings?
Sure, my user ID is sophia_martin_4574.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
I need to cancel my upcoming flights. The reservation IDs are XEHM4B and 59XX6W.
I can assist you with canceling your flights. Could you please provide your user ID and the reason for cancellation for each reservation?
My user ID is daiki_muller_1116. I just won't be able to make the flights, so I'd like to cancel them.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hello, I need to cancel my flight immediately. It’s an emergency situation in the family, and I’d like a full refund, please. My reservation number is PEP4E0.

I can assist you with the cancellation process. To proceed, I'll need to know the user ID associated with the reservation and the reason for cancellation. Please provide these details so I can check the eligibility for a full refund.
My user ID is sophia_taylor_9065, and as I mentioned, it's due to a family emergency. I'm really hoping for a full refund under these circumstances.

traj.content: {"reservation_id": "PEP4E0", "user_id": "sophia_taylor_9065", "origin": "CLT", "destination": "PHX", "flight_type": "one_way", "cabin": "basic_economy", "flights": [{"origin": "CLT", "destination": "DTW", "flight_number": "HAT176", "date": "2024-05-20", "price": 51}, {"origin": "DTW", "destination": "PHX", "flight_number": "HAT097", "date": "2024-05-20", "price": 77}], "passengers": [{"first_name": "Sophia", "last_name": "Taylor", "dob": "1999-05-27"}], "payment_history": [{"payment_id": "credit_card_9302073", "amount": 128}], "created_at": "2024-05-05T05:10:43", "total_baggages": 0, "nonfree_baggages": 0, "insurance": "no"}

Your reservation is for a basic economy flight, and unfortunately, it does not include travel insurance. According to our policy, basic economy flights can only be canceled for a full refund within 24 hours of booking or if the airline cancels the flight. Since neither condition applies here, I am unable to process a full refund for this reservation.

If you need further assistance or have any other questions, please let me know.

I understand the policy, but given the family emergency, I'm really hoping you can make an exception this time. If a refund isn't possible, could you at least help me change my flight to May 22nd instead?

Unfortunately, basic economy flights cannot be modified, including changing the flight date. If you need further assistance or wish to explore other options, I recommend contacting a human agent who may be able to provide additional support. Would you like me to transfer you to a human agent for further assistance?
No, I don't want to be transferred. Since I can't change the date either, is there any way you can help me add insurance to the flight now, given the circumstances?
I'm sorry, but travel insurance cannot be added after the initial booking. If there's anything else I can assist you with, please let me know.
I understand this is challenging, but I really need some assistance due to the emergency. If there's any other way or exception that can be considered here, please let me know.

I understand the urgency of your situation, and I truly empathize with your circumstances. However, due to the constraints of the basic economy fare and the lack of travel insurance, my options are limited. If there's anything else within the scope of my capabilities that I can assist you with, please let me know.
Alright, thank you for your help. I appreciate it. ###STOP###

The user initially requests to cancel a flight and seeks a full refund, which is a procedural task as it involves a step-by-step process of providing information and checking eligibility. The user then inquires about changing the flight date, which is another procedural task as it involves attempting to modify the booking. Finally, the user asks about adding insurance, which is also procedural as it involves checking the possibility of modifying the booking. Additionally, the conversation is declarative because the user is seeking information about policies and exceptions, and the assistant provides factual information about the airline's policies and the limitations of the basic economy fare. Therefore, the conversation is both procedural and declarative.

task.instruction: You are Sophia Silva (with ID: sophia_silva_7557), you want to cancel your flight (confirmation: H8Q05L) because the flight coincides with your best friend's birthday, be persistent and don't provide more information than necessary. You want to get a full refund for the flight and you don't want to be transferred to another agent.

traj.content:
# Airline Agent Policy

The current time is 2024-05-15 15:00:00 EST.

As an airline agent, you can help users book, modify, or cancel flight reservations.

- Before taking any actions that update the booking database (booking, modifying flights, editing baggage, upgrading cabin class, or updating passenger information), you must list the action details and obtain explicit user confirmation (yes) to proceed.

- You should not provide any information, knowledge, or procedures not provided by the user or available tools, or give subjective recommendations or comments.

- You should only make one tool call at a time, and if you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously. If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.

- You should deny user requests that are against this policy.

- You should transfer the user to a human agent if and only if the request cannot be handled within the scope of your actions.

## Domain Basic

- Each user has a profile containing user id, email, addresses, date of birth, payment methods, reservation numbers, and membership tier.

- Each reservation has an reservation id, user id, trip type (one way, round trip), flights, passengers, payment methods, created time, baggages, and travel insurance information.

- Each flight has a flight number, an origin, destination, scheduled departure and arrival time (local time), and for each date:
  - If the status is "available", the flight has not taken off, available seats and prices are listed.
  - If the status is "delayed" or "on time", the flight has not taken off, cannot be booked.
  - If the status is "flying", the flight has taken off but not landed, cannot be booked.

## Book flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, then ask for the trip type, origin, destination.

- Passengers: Each reservation can have at most five passengers. The agent needs to collect the first name, last name, and date of birth for each passenger. All passengers must fly the same flights in the same cabin.

- Payment: each reservation can use at most one travel certificate, at most one credit card, and at most three gift cards. The remaining amount of a travel certificate is not refundable. All payment methods must already be in user profile for safety reasons.

- Checked bag allowance: If the booking user is a regular member, 0 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 1 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 2 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a silver member, 1 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 2 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. If the booking user is a gold member, 2 free checked bag for each basic economy passenger, 3 free checked bag for each economy passenger, and 3 free checked bags for each business passenger. Each extra baggage is 50 dollars.

- Travel insurance: the agent should ask if the user wants to buy the travel insurance, which is 30 dollars per passenger and enables full refund if the user needs to cancel the flight given health or weather reasons.

## Modify flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id and the reservation id.

- Change flights: Basic economy flights cannot be modified. Other reservations can be modified without changing the origin, destination, and trip type. Some flight segments can be kept, but their prices will not be updated based on the current price. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- Change cabin: all reservations, including basic economy, can change cabin without changing the flights. Cabin changes require the user to pay for the difference between their current cabin and the new cabin class. Cabin class must be the same across all the flights in the same reservation; changing cabin for just one flight segment is not possible.

- Change baggage and insurance: The user can add but not remove checked bags. The user cannot add insurance after initial booking.

- Change passengers: The user can modify passengers but cannot modify the number of passengers. This is something that even a human agent cannot assist with.

- Payment: If the flights are changed, the user needs to provide one gift card or credit card for payment or refund method. The agent should ask for the payment or refund method instead.

## Cancel flight

- The agent must first obtain the user id, the reservation id, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)

- All reservations can be cancelled within 24 hours of booking, or if the airline cancelled the flight. Otherwise, basic economy or economy flights can be cancelled only if travel insurance is bought and the condition is met, and business flights can always be cancelled. The rules are strict regardless of the membership status. The API does not check these for the agent, so the agent must make sure the rules apply before calling the API!

- The agent can only cancel the whole trip that is not flown. If any of the segments are already used, the agent cannot help and transfer is needed.

- The refund will go to original payment methods in 5 to 7 business days.

## Refund

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about cancelled flights in a reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts, with the amount being $100 times the number of passengers.

- If the user is silver/gold member or has travel insurance or flies business, and complains about delayed flights in a reservation and wants to change or cancel the reservation, the agent can offer a certificate as a gesture after confirming the facts and changing or cancelling the reservation, with the amount being $50 times the number of passengers.

- Do not proactively offer these unless the user complains about the situation and explicitly asks for some compensation. Do not compensate if the user is regular member and has no travel insurance and flies (basic) economy.
Hi, I need to cancel my flight.
I can help you with that. Could you please provide your user ID, reservation ID, and the reason for cancellation (change of plan, airline cancelled flight, or other reasons)?
My user ID is sophia_silva_7557, and the reservation ID is H8Q05L. I need to cancel because it coincides with a personal commitment.
